text: The Szarlotka is a two-ingredient cocktail consisting of unfiltered apple juice and Żubrówka vodka (or, in the United States, ŻU Vodka). The cocktail is named after the Polish apple pie, Szarlotka. The cocktail can be garnished with cinnamon or star anise. ==References== Category:Two-ingredient cocktails
title: Szarlotka (cocktail)
